column4: hi   is there anyway to edit boot ...... can one enter ubunto as an administrator?
as root? we have sudo for that, and you likely want to keep it that way (security reasons)
it is possible, but I do recommend not to
if you insist read http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-31053.html but once again, it's recommended not to log in as root (especially by default)
